Name: Heavy Strike
Title: The Shatterstone Method
Desc: For those that aren't so strong...\nIt's best to regard the "The Shatterstone Method" as just a "metaphor."

Talent.Name: Heavy Strike
Talent.Desc: During this round, your current active character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Normal Attack is a $[K51]:</color> Deal +1 additional DMG.

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.
